mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user
1=1 AND id > 1
AND username like concat("%",#{username},"%")
AND real_name like concat("%",#{realName},"%")
ORDER BY ${orderByClause}
ORDER BY update_time DESC
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

1=1 AND id > 1
AND username like concat("%",#{username},"%")
AND real_name like concat("%",#{realName},"%")
